TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Charts implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: 指定的或活动工作簿中所有图表工作表的集合。

span.span: A collection of all the chart sheets in the specified or active workbook.

summary.span: 每个图表工作表由对象。

span.span: Each chart sheet is represented by a object.

summary.span: 这不包括工作表或对话框工作表上嵌入图表。

span.span: This doesn’t include charts embedded on worksheets or dialog sheets.

summary.span: 有关嵌入式图表的信息，请参阅对象。

span.span: For information about embedded charts, see the object.
Use the property to return the Charts collection.

para.span: 使用方法可创建新图表工作表并将其添加到工作簿。

span.span: Use the method to create a new chart sheet and add it to the workbook.

para.span: 可以组合方法与方法添加新图表包含从工作表中的数据。

span.span: You can combine the method with the method to add a new chart that contains data from a worksheet.

para.span: 使用图表()，其中是图表工作表的索引号或名称，可返回单个图表对象。

span.span: Use Charts(), where is the chart sheet index number or name, to return a single Chart object.

para.span: 集合包含工作簿 （图表工作表和工作表） 中的所有工作表。

span.span: The collection contains all the sheets in the workbook (both chart sheets and worksheets).

para.span: 使用工作表()，其中工作表名称或编号，就可以返回一个工作表。

span.span: Use Sheets(), where is the sheet name or number, to return a single sheet.

summary.span: 此对象、成员或枚举已被弃用并且不适合在您的代码中使用。

span.span: This object, member, or enumeration is deprecated and is not intended to be used in your code.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart Add2 (object Before, object After, object Count, object NewLayout);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Chart Add2([in]object Before, [in]object After, [in]object Count, [in]object NewLayout) runtime managed
Public Function Add2 (Optional Before As Object, Optional After As Object, Optional Count As Object, Optional NewLayout As Object) As Chart

param.name: Before
param.span: 指定工作表的对象，新建的工作表将置于此工作表之前。

span.span: An object that specifies the sheet before which the new sheet is added.

param.name: After
param.span: 指定工作表的对象，新建的工作表将置于此工作表之后。

span.span: An object that specifies the sheet after which the new sheet is added.

param.name: Count
param.span: 要添加的工作表数。默认值为 1。

span.span: The number of sheets to be added. The default value is one.

param.name: NewLayout
param.span: 如果NewLayout为True，将图表插入使用动态的新格式设置规则 （标题位于和图例才上是否有多个系列）。

span.span: If NewLayout is True, the chart is inserted by using the new dynamic formatting rules (Title is on, and Legend is on only if there are multiple series).

summary.span: 插入图表直接向网格。

span.span: Inserts a chart directly onto the grid.

summary.span: 将工作表复制到工作簿的另一位置。

span.span: Copies the sheet to another location in the workbook.

para.span: 如果不指定或，Microsoft Excel 将新建一个包含复制的工作表的新工作簿。

span.span: If you don't specify either or , Microsoft Excel creates a new workbook that contains the copied sheet.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator Creator { get; }
.property instance valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As XlCreator
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlCreator Creator { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlCreator get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，该整数指示在其中创建了此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which this object was created.

summary.span: 如果在 Microsoft Excel 中创建对象，此属性返回的字符串 XCEL，这相当于十六进制数字 5843454c。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.

summary.span: 只读。

span.span: Read-only .

para.span: Creator属性用于在 Microsoft Excel 中用于的 Macintosh，其中每个应用程序具有四个字符的创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Excel 具有 XCEL 的创建者代码。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

MemberSignature.Value: public void PrintOut (object From, object To, object Copies, object Preview, object ActivePrinter, object PrintToFile, object Collate, object PrToFileName);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PrintOut([in]object From, [in]object To, [in]object Copies, [in]object Preview, [in]object ActivePrinter, [in]object PrintToFile, [in]object Collate, [in]object PrToFileName) runtime managed

Public Sub PrintOut (Optional From As Object, Optional To As Object, Optional Copies As Object, Optional Preview As Object, Optional ActivePrinter As Object, Optional PrintToFile As Object, Optional Collate As Object, Optional PrToFileName As Object)

param.name: From

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 从中开始打印的页的页码。

span.span: The number of the page at which to start printing.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则打印从开头。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, printing starts at the beginning.

param.name: To

span.span: Optional Object.
The number of the last page to print.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则打印至最后一页。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, printing ends with the last page.

param.name: Copies

span.span: Optional Object.
The number of copies to print.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则打印一份。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, one copy is printed.

param.name: Preview

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: True由 Microsoft Excel 调用之前打印对象的打印预览。

span.span: True to have Microsoft Excel invoke print preview before printing the object.

param.span: False（或省略） 若要立即打印对象。

span.span: False (or omitted) to print the object immediately.

param.name: ActivePrinter

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 设置活动打印机的名称。

span.span: Sets the name of the active printer.

param.name: PrintToFile

span.span: Optional Object.
True to print to a file.

param.span: 如果未指定，则 Microsoft Excel 将提示用户输入输出文件的名称。

span.span: If is not specified, Microsoft Excel prompts the user to enter the name of the output file.

param.name: Collate

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则逐份打印多个副本。

span.span: True to collate multiple copies.

param.name: PrToFileName

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果设置为True，则该参数指定要打印到的文件的名称。

span.span: If is set to True, this argument specifies the name of the file you want to print to.

summary.span: 打印对象。

span.span: Prints the object.

para.span: 说明中的"页面"和指打印页、 工作表或工作簿中不整个页面。

span.span: "Pages" in the descriptions of and refers to printed pages, not overall pages in the sheet or workbook.
